widget_cli_upgrade_tip.en_US: Your widget-cli tool has a low version. Please execute "npm i -g @vikadata/widget-cli" in your terminal to upgrade it.

api_node_permission_error.en_US: No permission to operate on the node

api_upload_attachment_exceed_limit.en_US: You have uploaded the maximum number of attachments

api_space_capacity_over_limit.en_US: The Space has reached its maximum attachment capacity

wecom_app_intro.en_US: Allow you to log in to vikadata through WeCom, receive your Space's notifications in WeCom, and sync organizational chart from WeCom

wecom_app_notice.en_US: * Note: One Space can only bind one WeCom self-built application

dingtalk_app_intro.en_US: Allow you to log in to vikadata though DingTalk, receive your Space's notifications in DingTalk, and sync organizational chart from DingTalk

dingtalk_app_desc.en_US:
After opening the app, please complete the space station bundle, and after bundling your team can use Vikadata on DingTalk.

With Vikadata Assistant on DingTalk, you can:

  • Access Vikadata's space station and access space station data directly on DingTalk without logging in;
  • Collect notifications from the space station through DingTalk;
  • Set app visibility in DingTalk and automatically sync DingTalk organization structure;

dingtalk_app_notice.en_US: * Note: One Space can only bind one DingTalk self-built application

lark_app_intro.en_US: Allow you to log in to vikadata through Lark, receive your Space's notifications in Lark, and sync organizational chart from Lark

lark_app_desc.en_US:
After opening the app, please complete the space station bundle, and after bundling your team can use Vikadata on Lark.

With Vikadata Assistant on Lark, you can:

  • Access Vikadata's space station and access space station data directly on Lark without logging in;
  • Collect notifications from the space station through Lark;
  • Set app visibility in Lark and automatically sync Lark's organization structure;

lark_app_notice.en_US: * Note: One Space can only bind one Lark self-built application

send_again_toast.en_US: The user has not completed the registration. Resend the email invitation?

contact_us_qr_code_desc.en_US: Service and answers are always available when you have questions during use

tooltip_cannot_create_widget_from_dashbo.en_US: You can only create a widget from a datasheet rather than a dashboard

grade_desc.en_US: Spaces have three kinds of subscription plans: Bronze Plan, Silver Plan, Gold Plan and Enterprise Plan. Members in the Spaces of different subscription plans enjoy different benefits.

error_scan_qrcode_tips.en_US: Please check whether the application is deactivated

marketplace_integration_app_note_wechatc.en_US: *Note: Vikadata stops offering WeCom self-built applications. But existing applications won't be influenced.

test_function_form_submit_tip.en_US: After applying, you will receive a notification soon that the feature is enabled for your Space

wecom_social_deactivate_tip.en_US: If you need to disable the application, please go to WeCom Admin Panel -> Applications -> ç»´æ ¼è¡¨ -> Delete application.

upgrade_success_2_desc.en_US: We have assigned you an exclusive consultant, contact me for more convenient after-sales service

space_dashboard_contact_desc.en_US: Want to know more about upgrade renewal, order invoice, after-sales service, etc.? Please contact me

contact_model_desc.en_US: Do you have payment problems? Contact us to help you out

space_vika_paid_notify.en_US: Congratulations on your successful upgrade, you can go to the "space dashboard" to see the latest benefits

robot_panel_no_robot_tip.en_US: Robots are listening for data changes 24/7. Now unleash your creativity with automation.

robot_disable_create_tooltip.en_US: Please apply to enable the Robot feature first

upgrade_success_1_desc.en_US: Congratulations on your upgrade. Check out ${position} for the latest benefits

pay_model_price_public_transfer_desc.en_US: Please add exclusive customer service for corporate transfer

plan_model_members_tips.en_US: Not enough? Click on me to switch to ${space_leve}

space_paid_notify.en_US: You have successfully purchased "". The amount paid is .

space_lark_notify_email_title.en_US: The "{SPACE_NAME}" space is using the "Lark Integration" feature exclusive to enterprise space

space_lark_notify.en_US: The space is using "Lark Integration", a feature exclusive to enterprise space, please upgrade to continue using it

lark_integration_ability_desc.en_US: Using Lark's self-built applications, you canï¼š

lark_integration_step1_content.en_US:
• Bind the current space to Lark, the original data can be retained intact
  • Access the vikadata space directly from the Lark Workbench to enable password-free login and access to space data
  • Receive member notifications and comment notifications from vikadata right on Lark to stay on top of space developments
  • Lark and vikadata dual-site contacts are automatically updated/synchronized, and vikadata maintains the same organizational structure as Lark

lark_integration_step1_warning.en_US:
• Operators must have administrative access to both vikadata space and Lark

    The operator needs to be the main administrator of the space and also have the permission to create self-built applications in the Lark administration backend

  • The original members of the space will be removed from the space station, and then the member information and department information will be synchronized from the Lark side in one direction

    After Lark integration is enabled, member and department information will be based on the Lark side, so the original member/group information cannot be retained, and related permission information (sub-administrator permission, file permission, column permission, etc.) will be lost, so please let administrators know and make preparations

lark_integration_step1_tips_content.en_US: • In addition to the build-your-own app approach, we also offer a version of the Lark Store app that is ready to use right out of the box without configuration and binding to the space What's different?

lark_integration_step5_error_content.en_US:
• 1. whether the request URL is pasted incorrectly.
  • 2. Step 4 "Event Subscription" whether the Encrypt Key or Verification Token is correctly entered

lark_integration_config_tip.en_US: If you need to modify the application information, please deactivate the Lark integration first before doing so

lark_integration_sync_success.en_US: All operations on the vikadata side have been completed

password_not_identical_err.en_US: 'New password' and 'Confirm new password' must match

wecom_grade_desc.en_US: Spaces have three kinds of billing plans: Basic Plan with WeCom(permanently free), Standard Plan with WeCom and Enterprise Plan with WeCom. Members in the Spaces of different billing plans enjoy different rights and benefits.

welcome_sub_title1.en_US: Watch videos to learn about vikadata

limit_chart_values.en_US: There are currently too many graphic categories, showing only the first 300 types of data

trash_tip.en_US: You can restore files deleted in the past ${day} days from the Trash. Expired files will be deleted permanently.

widget_no_access_datasheet.en_US: No permission to access the data

restore_space_confirm_delete.en_US: This Space will be deleted forever at this given time

del_space_now_tip.en_US: The Space can't be restored after deletion. All files and attachments will be deleted.

test_function_modal_info_view_manual_sav.en_US:
When multiple members modify filter, group, or sorting in the same view, conflicts often arise, because everyone wants to configure them according to their own needs. After enabling this function, temporary view configuration is supported in "Datasheet" and "Mirror" to reduce conflicts

Impacts after this function is turned on:

  • View configurations modified by a member are not synchronized to other members but only take effect temporarily for himself
  • "Mirror" also supports temporary view configuration. Special case: the filters under the source datasheet view cannot be modified in the mirror
  • View configuration includes: filter, group, sort, hidden columns, style, layout, column order, summary bar, etc.

add_folder_reader.en_US: Can't edit files or comment in the records

add_datasheet_reader.en_US: Can't edit files or comment in the records

subject_space_apply.en_US: {USER_NAME} is applying to join your Space "{SPACE_NAME}"

subject_transfer_widget_notify.en_US: The ownership of your widget "{WIDGET_NAME}" has been transferred

subject_invite_notify.en_US: {USER_NAME} invited you to join the Space "{SPACE_NAME}"

form_cover_crop_desc.zh_CN: æ”¯æŒJPGã€PNG å’Œ GIF æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå›¾ç‰‡å¤§å°éœ€åœ¨ 5MB ä»¥å†…
form_cover_crop_desc.en_US: Support JPG, PNG, and GIF images under 5 MB

marketplace_integration_app_note_feishu.en_US: Note: One Space can only bind one Lark self-built application

marketplace_integration_app_dec_feishu.en_US:
After opening the app, please complete the space station bundle, and after bundling your team can use Vikadata on Lark.

With Vikadata Assistant on Lark, you can:

  • Access Vikadata's space station and access space station data directly on Lark without logging in;
  • Collect notifications from the space station through Lark;
  • Set app visibility in Lark and automatically sync Lark's organization structure;

marketplace_integration_app_info_fesihu.en_US: Allow you to log in to vikadata through Lark, receive your Space's notifications in Lark, and sync organizational chart from Lark

client_meta_label_file_deleted_desc.en_US: The shared file is deleted, so the public share link is invalid

client_meta_label_template_deleted_desc.en_US: The template does not exist or is deleted, so the share link is invalid

client_meta_label_share_disable_desc.en_US: The shared public link is disabled so you can't access the file

api_panel_md_python_example.en_US:
## Initialize SDK [![github]({{ githubIcon }})](https://github.com/vikadata/vika.py)

```python
from vika import Vika
vika = Vika("{{ apiToken }}")
datasheet = vika.datasheet("{{ datasheetId }}", field_key="{{ fieldKey }}")
```

{{ fieldNameTips }}
<!--split-->

## Get records

```python
# Returns all records
records = datasheet.records.all()
for record in records:
  print(record.json())

# Returns the records from a specific view
records_via_view = datasheet.records.all(viewId="{{ viewId }}")
# Get one record (if there are more than one records in the result, return the first record); It's recommended to get one record by its recordId.
one_record = datasheet.records.get({{ pyGetParams }})
# Returns the records that matches the given condition. If you don't give any condition, it returns all records.
records = datasheet.records.filter({{ pyGetParams }})
```
<!--split-->

## Add records
```python
# Add one record
row = datasheet.records.create({{ addParams }})
# Add multiple records
records = datasheet.records.bulk_create({{  bulkAddParams }})

```
<!--split-->

## Update records
```python
row = datasheet.records.get({{ pyGetParams }})

# Update one record
row.{{ oneFieldKey }} = {{ oneFieldValue }}
## row.save()

# Update multiple records
row.update({{ updateParams }})

```
<!--split-->

## Delete records
```python
record = datasheet.records.get({{ pyGetParams }})
# Delete one record
record.delete()
# Delete the records that matches a specific condition
datasheet.records.filter({{ pyGetParams }}).delete()
# Delete the records by recordIds
datasheet.delete_records({{ recordIds }})
```
<!--split-->

## Upload attachments

```python
_file = datasheet.upload_file(<local/web_filepath>)
record.{{ attachFieldName }} = [_file]
```

api_panel_type_desc_attachment.en_US: Returns an array of attachment objects. api_panel_type_desc_last_modified_by.en_US: Returns an array that contains one unit object. The unit is the last unit that modifies the record or the specified field(s). (A unit describes the roles in a Space such as a member or a team. "unitType" has two values: 1 stands for team; 3 stands for member.)

office_preview_app_desc.en_US:
Seamless online preview of office files in Vigor Table, allowing you to view common office files such as Excel, Word, PPT, etc. on your PC or cell phone anywhere, anytime

  • Online preview of .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, and .pdf formatted office files
  • Desktop and mobile simultaneous support for file preview of the above formats

    • Additional notes:

  • This feature is powered by "Yoncentric Cloud Conversion" and officially integrated by Vigilometer
  • Click the "Authorize" button below to enable this app and agree that "Yoncentric Cloud Conversion" reads the office files you want to preview
  • If you no longer need the office preview feature, the administrator can visit this page again to disable it

office_preview_app_intro.en_US: With this integration, you can easily preview Microsoft Office files in "Attachment" columns

integration_app_wecom_matters.en_US:
• In order to integrate the existing Space station with wecom, the operator needs to have the management authority of datasheet Space and wecom at the same time, that is, the main administrator of the Space is also the administrator with application management authority in wecom, and ensure that the wecom account is in normal use
  • The Space is integrated with the wecom. The address book on the wecon side needs to be synchronized in one direction. The member and group information will be refreshed.If the Space member has not been bound to the wecom, the Space will be removed, grayed out in the member column, and the relevant permissions will be cleared. It needs to be reset after the same step in the address book

function_countif_summary.en_US:
Count the number of keyword occurrences in values. 

Values: specify where to find the data from. Supports data of array type or text type. 
Keyword: the keyword to be looked up and counted. 
Operation: comparator, not required. You can fill in the condition symbols greater than ">", less than "<", equal to "=", not equal to "! =", if not filled in the default is equal to. 
Example 1 does not fill in the comparison character, the default count is equal to the number of times the value of "A" appears. 
Example 2 is filled with the comparator ">", which means that the number of occurrences of values greater than "2" is counted. 

Usage scenarios. 
1) You can count the number of occurrences of the character "A" in a string of text arrays [A, B, C, D, A] as 2, see example 1. 
2) You can count the number of numbers greater than 3 in an array of numbers [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] as 2, see example 2. 
3) You can count the number of occurrences of "grape" in a string of text "eat grapes without spitting out the skin" as 2, see example 3.

test_function_modal_info_widget.en_US:
As vikadata is essentially a visualized database, the widget is the best helper to quickly turn the database into different applications. Now, vikadata supports custom widgets, allowing developers to make full use of widget SDK to develop widgets that meet business scenarios and personal needs. See documentation

Examples of custom widgets:

  • Cell viewer: help you easily browse data from different column types, such as Magic Link, Rollup, and Attachments
  • Vika map: help you quickly render the addresses from a datasheet in a Google map
  • URL preview: help you preview the webpage content from a URL

function_datetime_diff_summary.en_US:
Returns the difference between datetimes in specified units. Default units are seconds. (See list of unit specifiers here.)
The difference between datetimes is determined by subtracting [date2] from [date1]. This means that if [date2] is later than [date1], the resulting value will be negative.

marketplace_integration_app_dec_dingtalk.en_US:
After opening the app, please complete the space station bundle, and after bundling your team can use Vikadata on DingTalk.

With Vikadata Assistant on DingTalk, you can:

  • Access Vikadata's space station and access space station data directly on DingTalk without logging in;
  • Collect notifications from the space station through DingTalk;
  • Set app visibility in DingTalk and automatically sync DingTalk organization structure;

test_function_modal_info_robot.en_US:
Vika Robots are the guardians for your work efficiency on the Vika Planet. Human beings are meant to do more creative things! < a href="https://vika.cn/help/manual-vika-robot" target ="_blank"> View documentation

Example Robots:

  • Robot Alpha: When a record is created, Alpha will automatically send a message to the Slack channel
  • Robot Beta: When a specific form is submitted, Beta will automatically send a message to the Lark chat group
  • Robot Delta: when a record meets a specific condition, Delta will automatically update another record in another datasheet

marketplace_integration_app_dec_office_p.en_US:
Seamless online preview of office files in Vigor Table, allowing you to view common office files such as Excel, Word, PPT, etc. on your PC or cell phone anywhere, anytime

  • Online preview of .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, and .pdf formatted office files
  • Desktop and mobile simultaneous support for file preview of the above formats

    • Additional notes:

  • This feature is powered by "Yoncentric Cloud Conversion" and officially integrated by Vigilometer
  • Click the "Authorize" button below to enable this app and agree that "Yoncentric Cloud Conversion" reads the office files you want to preview
  • If you no longer need the office preview feature, the administrator can visit this page again to disable it

function_switch_summary.en_US: Takes an expression, a list of possible values for that expression, and for each one, a value that the expression should take in that case. It can also take a default value if the expression input doesn't match any of the defined patterns. In many cases, SWITCH() can be used instead of a nested IF() formula.

marketplace_integration_app_dec_feishu_h.en_US:
After opening the app, please complete the space station bundle, and after bundling your team can use Vikadata on Lark.

With Vikadata Assistant on Lark, you can:

  • Access Vikadata's space station and access space station data directly on Lark without logging in;
  • Collect notifications from the space station through Lark;
  • Set app visibility in Lark and automatically sync Lark's organization structure;

feishu_manage_title.en_US:
With this app, you can let your team use vika table onfeishu, which is a team instant messaging software launched by ByteDance company.

function_last_modified_time_summary.en_US: Returns the date and time of the most recent modification made by a user in a non-computed field in the table. If you only care about changes made to specific fields, you can include one or more field names, and the function will just return the date and time of the most recent change made to any of the specified fields.

function_day_summary.en_US: Returns the day of the month of a datetime in the form of a number between 1-31.

function_second_summary.en_US: Returns the second of a datetime as an integer between 0 and 59.

function_weekday_summary.en_US:
Returns the day of the week as an integer between 0 and 6, inclusive. You may optionally provide a second argument (either "Sunday" or "Monday") to start weeks on that day. If omitted, weeks start on Sunday by default. Example:
WEEKDAY(TODAY(), "Monday")

function_weeknum_summary.en_US:
Returns the week number in a year. You may optionally provide a second argument (either "Sunday" or "Monday") to start weeks on that day. If omitted, weeks start on Sunday by default. Example:
WEEKNUM(TODAY(), "Monday")

function_floor_summary.en_US: Returns the nearest integer multiple of significance that is less than or equal to the value. If no significance is provided, a significance of 1 is assumed.

function_int_summary.en_US: Returns the greatest integer that is less than or equal to the specified value.

function_len_summary.en_US: Extract howMany characters from the beginning of the string.

function_max_summary.en_US: Returns the largest of the given numbers.

function_mid_summary.en_US: Extract a substring of count characters starting at whereToStart.

function_min_summary.en_US: Returns the smallest of the given numbers.

function_mod_summary.en_US: Returns the remainder after dividing the first argument by the second.

function_odd_summary.en_US: Rounds positive value up the the nearest odd number and negative value down to the nearest odd number.

function_power_summary.en_US: Computes the specified base to the specified power.

function_replace_summary.en_US:

function_rept_summary.en_US: Repeats string by the specified number of times.

function_right_summary.en_US: Extract howMany characters from the end of the string.

function_rounddown_summary.en_US: Rounds the value to the number of decimal places given by "precision," always rounding down, i.e., toward zero. (You must give a value for the precision or the function will not work.)

function_roundup_summary.en_US: Rounds the value to the number of decimal places given by "precision," always rounding up, i.e., away from zero. (You must give a value for the precision or the function will not work.)

Searches for an occurrence of stringToFind in whereToSearch string starting from an optional startFromPosition. (startFromPosition is 0 by default.) If no occurrence of stringToFind is found, the result will be empty.
Similar to FIND(), though FIND() returns 0 rather than empty if no occurrence of stringToFind is found.
